an5.239:4.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.239:4.7: And they waste a gift given in faith.
an5.239:4.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.239:5.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.239:5.7: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
an5.239:5.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
